txt.en: You should return to Radagast in Thornholt with all the ingredients you have collected.
You should place all the ingredients in the nearby mortar and pestle for Radagast, in Thornholt woods.
Mix ingredients in mortar and pestle

'For all the tireless scouring of Thornholt I have done, and you stumbled across the trail quick as could be! But that is no matter, as long as the vile poisoners are stopped. I am a simple man. I seek not glory but peace.\n\n'You had better return to the brown wizard and seek his council on this whole affair. I will stay put and speak with  Threkmóth on what actions we shall take.'
You should return to Vaskorn in Skoghús, in the Thornholt woods, and tell him of Radagast's potion.
Mix ingredients in mortar and pestle
Vaskorn advises seeking the council of Radagast in the fight against the poisoners of the woods.

'Well, I never said it would smell nice. The odour is how you know it will work!

'I will test this batch, and if all goes well, I will be able to make enough for you and the Beornings to protect against the Ungoladan weapons.

'Return to the Beornings now and make our work here known to them. Before you proceed with the assault on the Ungoledain, return to me and I will provide you with an antidote sufficient for the task.'

'Well, I never said it would smell nice. The odour is how you know it will work!

'I will test this batch, and if all goes well, I will be able to make enough for you and the other Beornings to protect against the Ungoladan weapons.

'Return to the Beorning settlement now and make our work here known to them. Before you proceed with the assault on the Ungoledain, return to me and I will provide you with an antidote sufficient for the task.'
'Very good, this should suffice, [placeholder]! I need to do one more test to make sure it's safe for our kind. Could you combine all those ingredients in the mortar and pestle for me?'
Vaskorn is not at his post. Perhaps Threkmóth knows where he is
The ingredients mix to form a pungent concoction
'Very good. This should suffice, [placeholder]! I need to do one more test to be certain that it is safe for your kind. Could you combine all those ingredients in the mortar and pestle for me?'
The ingredients mix to form a pungent concoction

'Well, I never said it would smell nice. The odour is how you know it will work!

'I will test this batch, and if all goes well, I will be able to make enough for you and the other Beornings to protect against the Ungoledain weapons.

'Return to the Beorning settlement now and make our work here known to them. Before you proceed with the assault on the Ungoledain, return to me and I will provide you with an antidote sufficient for the task.'
Radagast can be found in the Thornholt woods.\n\nYou should return to Radagast with the mixed concoction.

'I know full well that Vaskorn is not at his post. It is I, my very self, who told him to take care of these spider-folk and drive them away while I finish baking the honey cakes. I told him he should have two honey cakes for himself, when he returned!'
You should return to Radagast, located at the highest point of Thornholt.

'These Ungoledain are indeed a threat. Many of my friends have perished to their poison. While you were away I began experimenting with a potion to protect against it. I think I have perfected the concoction.

'If you collect the ingredients, I will be able to make plenty to protect you, the Beorning, and most importantly, my friends.

'Here is what you must find: some poison of the Ungoledain, which is likely obtained most easily from their discarded weapons; clean water from a good source; the livers of animals sickened from the poison; and some of the common mushrooms that may be found all around Thornholt.'

'Well, I never said it would smell nice. The odour is how you know it will work!

'I will test this batch, and if all goes well, I will be able to make enough for you and the Beornings to protect against the Ungoledain weapons.

'Return to the Beornings now and make our work here known to them. Before you proceed with the assault on the Ungoledain, return to me and I will provide you with an antidote sufficient for the task.'

All the items can be found in and around the Thornholt woods.\n\nYou should collect the ingredients Radagast requires for the potion of protection against the Ungoladan-poison: poison from discarded Ungoladan weapons, fresh water, livers of animals sickened from the poison, and the mushrooms common to Thornholt.
You should go to Threkmóth in Skoghús, in the Thornholt woods, and find out where Vaskorn is.
